name: 黃瀅瑛
objective: The introductory course gives an overview about VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented reality) technology applied in different workspace and its designs. Various applications and examples of VR and AR applied in workspace design will be demonstrated. The goal of this course is to empower students in learning and applying the practical uses of VR/AR technology applied in manufacturing and workspace design. The exercise sessions include: VR/AR systems demonstration, experimental design of human-machine-interaction (HMI) systems, basic training and application of Unity, etc.
